GSD.description:
ext4: fix bug_on in ext4_writepages

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit 73fd5b19285197078ee8a2e651d75d5b094a4de9. For more details please see the references link.
